definition: checkpoint (for taxation, security etc)/barrier/hurdle/red tape/CL:個|个[ge4],道[dao4]
mountain pass/to close/to shut/to turn off/to concern/to involve
to block/to be stuck/to be wedged/customs station/a clip/a fastener/a checkpost/Taiwan pr. [ka3]
to stop/to block/(computing) (coll.) slow/(loanword) card/CL:張|张[zhang1],片[pian4]/truck (from "car")/calorie (abbr. for 卡路里[ka3 lu4 li3])/cassette

sentences.english: The short horse gets a passport to the fort.
sentences.chinese: 小矮马有一张关卡堡垒的通行证。

sentences.english: For this second level it’s a classic base defence of the kind that Men Of War does really well.
sentences.chinese: 第二关是那种战争之人系列很擅长的防守关卡。

sentences.english: This is a warmup for a later level.
sentences.chinese: 这一关是为往后的关卡暖身。

sentences.english: I did not expect to be detained by the KMT in Xi'an, held in Xi'an reformatory.
sentences.chinese: 没想到在西安关卡被国民党扣留，关押在西安感化院。

sentences.english: The existence of Hymen became the toll-gate of a inspectability function.
sentences.chinese: 处女膜的存在成了一道检验性功能的关卡。

sentences.english: Harry gets put in the Triwizard Tournament. With dragons and mermaids.
sentences.chinese: 哈利被陷害参加了三强争霸赛，关卡中有龙有人鱼。

sentences.english: This remastered version is faithful to the original, including its unforgiving difficulty.
sentences.chinese: 此修复版的版本忠于原著，包括那些无情的关卡。

sentences.english: Can the streamed level be loaded?
sentences.chinese: 能流模式加载的关卡是否被加载？

sentences.english: Trincomalee bristles with soldiers and checkpoints.
sentences.chinese: 亭可马里处处都是士兵和关卡。

sentences.english: With most switch cards, there will be some small capacitance between adjacent channels.
sentences.chinese: 对于大多数开关卡，相邻通道间都具有小的电容。

sentences.english: Matrix switch cards generally have two or three poles per crosspoint.
sentences.chinese: 矩阵开关卡通常在每个交叉点有两个或三个电极。

sentences.english: Make sure the wires are long enough so that the switch cards can be removed easily from the mainframe for service.
sentences.chinese: 请确保导线足够长，能够方便地从主机中拆下开关卡。

sentences.english: At the start, jump into the concrete pit, dig and drop through.
sentences.chinese: 在关卡开始时，跳进水泥洞中，挖洞，然后跳下去。

sentences.english: The storyline of Diablo II is played through four acts.
sentences.chinese: 暗黑破坏神II的故事是通过四个关卡。

sentences.english: Complete all Story Mode Levels in Temple of Doom Hub.
sentences.chinese: 完成魔宫场景的全部故事模式关卡。

sentences.english: Fig. 2. Our little level surrounded by a cube.
sentences.chinese: 我们设计的关卡被一个立方体所包围着。

definition: to clear customs/(gaming) to finish (a game, a level, a stage, etc)
